comments.text:
Created attachment 569251
Screenshot

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.202 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Tools > Import > Import Everything > Next


Actual results:

A blank page with no check box to select an application.

"Import preferences, Account Settings, Address Book, Filters, and other data from:"


Expected results:

Seems I don't have a compatible application, so should appear a warning saying this.
comments.author: iirineu@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.202 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Tools > Import > Import Everything > Next


Actual results:

A blank page with no check box to select an application.

"Import preferences, Account Settings, Address Book, Filters, and other data from:"


Expected results:

Seems I don't have a compatible application, so should appear a warning saying this.

comments.text: This isn't the address book import wizard, this is import everything which is a different code route.
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: This isn't the address book import wizard, this is import everything which is a different code route.
